SELECT b.id, b.book_id, b.user_id, b.author, b.number, b.borrow_time, b.is_del, b.type, b.repay_time, b.pay, u.username AS userName, k.book_name AS bookName, r.resource_name AS typeName, (TO_DAYS(b.repay_time) - TO_DAYS(b.borrow_time)) AS surplus, (TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(b.repay_time)) AS days, (CASE WHEN (TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(b.repay_time)) <= 0 then '未逾期' ELSE '已逾期' END ) AS statusShow, (CASE WHEN (TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(b.repay_time)) <= 0 then '无需缴费' WHEN (TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(b.repay_time)) > 0 and b.pay is null then '未缴费' ELSE '已缴费' END ) AS payShow FROM borrow_car b LEFT JOIN resource_school r ON b.type = r.id LEFT JOIN user_school u ON b.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN book k ON b.book_id = k.id
b.user_id = #{user.id}
and k.book_name LIKE "%"#{book.bookName}"%"
and b.is_del = 0

SELECT b.id, b.book_id, b.user_id, b.author, b.number, b.borrow_time, b.is_del, b.type, b.repay_time, b.pay, u.username AS userName, k.book_name AS bookName, r.resource_name AS typeName, cs.card_money AS cardMoney, (0.8*(TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(b.repay_time))) AS penalty, (TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(b.repay_time)) AS days FROM borrow_car b LEFT JOIN resource_school r ON b.type = r.id LEFT JOIN user_school u ON b.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN book k ON b.book_id = k.id LEFT JOIN card_school cs ON cs.user_id = u.id WHERE b.id = #{id}
